column3: College of Arts, Celtic Studies and Social Sciences
column5: Our MSc in International Public Policy & Diplomacy (MSc IPPD) is an innovative, interdisciplinary, taught master’s course that provides graduates with the expertise required for successful careers in international policy environments.The course is offered by UCC’s Departments of Government and Politics, History, Law and Food Business and Development, and will give you access to expertise across a diverse range of subjects. The MSc International Public Policy & Diplomacy is strongly orientated toward vocational skills training, through coursework and an opportunity to undertake a work placement.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
